title.text: Event-coreference across Multiple, Multi-lingual Sources in the Mumis Project

abstractContent.text: We present our work on information extraction from multiple, multilingual sources for the Multimedia Indexing and Searching Environment (MUMIS), a project aiming at developing technology to produce formal annotations about essential events in multimedia programme material.

entities.text: information extraction from multiple, multilingual sources

abstractContent.text: The novelty of our approach consists on the use of a merging or cross-document coreference algorithm that aims at combining the output delivered by the information extraction systems.
